resources.string: Sorry, the puzzle is not valid…

Tap on Play in the main menu and select a puzzle size to start a game. You will be given a random puzzle to solve. Remember to tap Finish when you are done. \n\n Each puzzle consists of a 4x4, 6x6 or 9x9 grid containing given clues in various places. The object is to fill all empty squares so that the numbers 1 to 4 (for 4x4 puzzles), 1 to 6 (for 6x6 puzzles) or 1 to 9 (for 9x9 puzzles) appear exactly once in each row, column and box.

Tap on Create in the main menu and select a puzzle size. You will then be presented with an empty puzzle that you can fill out. Tap on Save to add it to the list of random puzzles you get in Play mode.\n N.B. There is no check to see if a puzzle is solvable, so be careful when clicking save.
